Text:
Nice - thank you for this - so much cleaner and flatter than any of the commercial releases.

There's just one problem: it's nowhere near loud enough. Very enjoyable but missing a *lot* when the loudness is so limited. Otherwise the transfer is really well done. 

Thanks again to the OP and the seeders.

This is still WELL WORTH downloading. It's a superb transfer and plenty loud enough to enjoy. It just won't blow the walls down - which is what you want sometimes. :) 

Especially on songs like Squonk or Los Endos, once in awhile you want serious LOUDNESS and you won't get it from this recording. 

But you'll still LOVE what you hear.
